---
title: "Complete Mixing"
output: distill::distill_article
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


Complete mixing denotes the feature of an agent-based model, that all agents interact with each other in every time step.
In graph terms, you can think of this as agents being connected by a complete graph and interacting with all their neighbors.
